SEARCH
Package seng201.team53.game.map

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.game.map.Tile
public class Tile extends Object
Represents a tile on the game map which stores properties relating to build-ability, location and if it is a path tile

  • Constructor Details

    • Tile

      public Tile(boolean buildable, boolean path, int x, int y)
      Constructs a new tile with the specified properties
      Parameters:
      buildable - If the tile can have a tower built on it
      path - If the tile is a part of the path
      x - The x-coordinate of the tile on the map
      y - The y-coordinate of the tile on the map

  • Method Details

    • canPlaceTower

      public boolean canPlaceTower()
      Determines if a tower can be placed on this tile
      Returns:
      true if a tower can be placed, false otherwise

    • canMoveTower

      public boolean canMoveTower()
      Determines if a tower occupying this tile can be moved
      Returns:
      true If the tower can be moved, false otherwise

    • isBuildable

      public boolean isBuildable()
      Check if towers can be placed onto this tile
      Returns:
      true if the tile is buildable and not a path tile, false otherwise

    • isPath

      public boolean isPath()
      Check if this tile is a part of the path
      Returns:
      true if the tile is a part of the path, false otherwise

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Retrieves the x-coordinate of this tile
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Retrieves the y-coordinate of this tile
      Returns:
      The y-coordinate

    • getTower

      public Tower getTower()
      Retrieves the tower placed on this tile
      Returns:
      The tower on this tile, or null if no tower is present

    • setTower

      public void setTower(Tower tower)
      Sets a tower on this tile
      Parameters:
      tower - The tower to be placed on this tile
